amendment.description: To provide that certain air cargo security programs are implemented, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1189 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1189.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1189 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1189 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 180.
Amendment SA 1189 ruled out of order by the chair.
